mapper.insert: insert into mbsp_tbl ( mbsp_id, mbsp_name, mbsp_email, mbsp_password, mbsp_zipcode, mbsp_addr, mbsp_deaddr, mbsp_phone, mbsp_nick, mbsp_receive ) values ( #{mbsp_id}, #{mbsp_name}, #{mbsp_email}, #{mbsp_password}, #{mbsp_zipcode}, #{mbsp_addr}, #{mbsp_deaddr}, #{mbsp_phone}, #{mbsp_nick}, #{mbsp_receive} )
mapper.select: select mbsp_id from mbsp_tbl where mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
select mbsp_id, mbsp_name, mbsp_email, mbsp_password, mbsp_zipcode, mbsp_addr, mbsp_deaddr, mbsp_phone, mbsp_nick from mbsp_tbl where mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
select mbsp_id, mbsp_name, mbsp_email, mbsp_password, mbsp_zipcode, mbsp_addr, mbsp_deaddr, mbsp_phone, mbsp_nick, mbsp_datesub, mbsp_updatedate from mbsp_tbl where mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
